changeSet.createView: select a.class, a.feature_string as feature_1, a.option_value as option_1, a.source_material as source_material_1, b.feature_string as feature_2, b.option_value as option_2, b.source_material as source_material_2, c.feature_string as feature_3, c.option_value as option_3, c.source_material as source_material_3, d.feature_string as feature_4, d.option_value as option_4, d.source_material as source_material_4, e.feature_string as feature_5, e.option_value as option_5, e.source_material as source_material_5, f.feature_string as feature_6, f.option_value as option_6, f.source_material as source_material_6 from lu_character_altering_class_feature_option a left join lu_character_altering_class_feature_option b on a.class = b.class and b.feature_order_by = 2 left join lu_character_altering_class_feature_option c on a.class = c.class and c.feature_order_by = 3 left join lu_character_altering_class_feature_option d on a.class = d.class and d.feature_order_by = 4 left join lu_character_altering_class_feature_option e on a.class = e.class and e.feature_order_by = 5 left join lu_character_altering_class_feature_option f on a.class = f.class and f.feature_order_by = 6 where a.feature_order_by = 1 order by class

changeSet.createView: with r1 as (select race, source_material as race_source_material from lu_race) select r1.race, r1.race_source_material, c.class, c.feature_1, c.option_1, c.source_material_1, c.feature_2, c.option_2, c.source_material_2, c.feature_3, c.option_3, c.source_material_3, c.feature_4, c.option_4, c.source_material_4, c.feature_5, c.option_5, c.source_material_5, c.feature_6, c.option_6, c.source_material_6 from v_character_altering_class_feature_combination c cross join r1 order by r1.race, c.class
